import React from 'react' import {Button, Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card} from 'react-bootstrap'; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps'; import Loader from '../components/Loader'; import Message from '../components/Message'; function PlaceOrderScreen() { const {shippingAddress, paymentMethod, cartItems} = useSelector(state => state.cart); return ( <>

Shipping

Address: {shippingAddress.address}, {shippingAddress.city}, {shippingAddress.postalCode}, {shippingAddress.country}

Payment Method

Method: {paymentMethod},

Order Items

{cartItems} ) } export default PlaceOrderScreen
